case.state: Excuse me, does this table have room for... Oh? Hijiyama-kun? So you really came here after all...

You want me to call you... "senpai"? Why? Are you some kind of poker veteran? I guess I shouldn't go easy on you, then.

state.text: ~human~--? That's-- I'm not calling you that. "Onii-san" is one thing, since I guess you're older than me, but... doesn't that sound a little too intimate? Just settle for Onii-san for now, okay...

case.state: Your name is-- Ah, sorry, that surprised me. It's just that I... also know someone called that.
Huh, look who's here again! I guess we're well acquainted at this point, so it's fine for me to join your table, right, ~human~?

Oh, this table is almost full... do you happen to have room for one more? I really wanted to check this place out myself.
Excuse me, may I join your... oh, ~human~? Didn't think I'd find you here again. Nice to see a familiar face here.
I figured I'd try this place myself, if I was going to recommend it to someone else...

Oh, so it's an all-male game? Ah-- Yeah, I should probably warn beforehand, I'm a guy too, I just don't dress like one.
Oh, so it's an all-male table? I'm definitely not complaining about that.
(Hmmm. Maybe this'll be an interesting game.)
(This table... they're all towering over me--!)
Nothing wrong with just wanting to drown your sorrows a little bit, right? Give me a second before the game starts, I'll get a beer.
Let's just get the game started, okay? I'm here to take my mind off things in the first place.
Oh, so it's an all-male game? Ah-- Yeah, I should probably warn beforehand, I'm a guy too, I just don't dress like one.
Wait, but couldn't more people join-- Hmmm. Hold on, I have a strange feeling... like we have something in common or I've seen him before?
Oh, we have something in common then, Aoba! Hey, it's nice to know I'm not alone in this for once.
Oh, huh, is this going to get broadcasted...? I was not... expecting that, but okay.
Are we doing introductions? I'm Tsukasa Okino-- Wait, is that a butterfly? (Some kind of talking robot, probably...?)
You know, I almost suggested you came here as a joke, but seeing you actually did that... And to think you used to stumble over your words everytime we even talked...
Ah, introductions, right-- You can call me Okino, first name Tsukasa. Um... (This is a game I will not pay much attention to.)
...? We still had a few spots left, though. Well... I guess this'll just be a shorter game. Call me Okino, nice to meet you two.
Are we doing introductions? You can just call me Okino, first name Tsukasa.

This is the sector Kisaragi's from... I wonder how she'd like a game like this. I don't know if it'd make her embarrassed, but I feel like she'd at least be a bit amused by it.
This is the sector Kisaragi's from... I wonder if she knows about this place. I have a feeling she'd be pretty good at this game. She's a really quick thinker.

..It's not easy to find pants that are properly my size. It was worse in the 2100s, but even now... something about people getting taller on average as time passes...

{small}...could have used some more work on it, though I guess that--{!reset} Hm? I was thinking out loud. Have you never seen someone do that?
What to do with this hand, now...
You know, I've been thinking, a lot of my teammates are in serious relationships now. I'm happy for them, of course, but, you know, feels weird to still be... ah, nevermind.

When I think about the matter of luck, I can't help but wonder about how lucky some people are to be in relationships sometimes... I mean, being single isn't the end of the world, but... ah, nevermind.
You know who has more luck than all poker players combined? My teammate Miura, who's already engaged. I mean, I'm 20, it's not like I'm rushing to get married but...

I've invited him already. He's a stubborn, kind of old-fashioned one, though. But I'm just as determined as he is, so I will be dragging him here one day.
(Hijiyama-kun is looking at her, huh... he really does have a type...)
This is a little embarrassing... being down to this, while I'm standing next to a handsome guy like you, Steve...
I know a guy who's only learned to do in his second year. I... don't think it's for the same reason as your situation, though.
Not an ex, but... I've had feelings for this one guy for way too long, but we've been dancing around each other for years. I've been thinking I need to move on too, but I have no clue how to do it.
I'm 20, but that's the least interesting fact here-- Do people actually do that?
It's a really cute set, Sucrose. You should feel proud of yourself, it's not as easy to put together a good look as other people might think.
I guess that makes sense for your... species? Do you actually enjoy the tastes too?
M/M, size difference. I'm a simple person. I've watched some of the more out there ones, but mostly just out of morbid curiosity. They don't do it for me.
Oh...? That's okay, Cheryl. If it's the name you prefer I'll pretend I didn't hear the previous one.
(Oh, but that's definitely an... eye-catching bulge, here...)

A big guy and a little guy, hm...
You're... awfully confident, huh? If you're so sure of yourself, that you won't regret saying this... Then that's fine by me. It sounds interesting enough.
Depends on which one, but... probably to find another job. Pff, sorry, Lucina, I know that's not helpful.
Oh, I relate to you, Aoba. One time I was straight up told my ID was fake so they wouldn't serve me drinks. I just wanted a little sake...
I used to feed this stray cat when I was in school... I named him Shintaro, but other students would call him by other names...

I'm thinking I could carry about three or four myself too. Maybe five? Realistically, though, I'd probably ask Hijiyama kun to carry them for me, so I would bet nearing ten in that case-- It still counts as me carrying them since he's doing it in my behalf, right?
I haven't done it for money. That's all I'll say.
So you... actually are kind of a pervert... huh...
It's an interesting table you ended up with, huh, ~human~... is this a coincidence, or have I learned something about how you see me...?
Ah, that's kind of you, Mari. I've been having fun, yeah... I definitely don't regret coming here to~background.time~.
On top sounds good... most guys aren't that good at taking initiative, so I wouldn't mind having to... do most of the work. But-- I'd also want to try being under someone...
Open relationship? I guess I've heard of that before. Good to hear it works for you two. For... certain people, I'd imagine it'd be quite difficult...

Oh, I most likely am not. If someone with the same genetic code as you dies, I think that's enough information to conclude it's likely you eventually will too.

In theory, yes. But sometimes, I'd even say often, people don't understand themselves. Besides, aren't we all egoists, deep down? Even if we're doing things for others, it's because it makes us feel good to do so.
Well, this honestly wouldn't be my usual strip poker table, but... it's been surprisingly fun, yeah.

You see, Jura, I find myself wondering the same thing sometimes. I guess just standing next to the right one is enough to make them interested... but if you want to get to that point, it's really different for every man.
Oh, trust me, Jura, I want to know how to do it just as much as you. Every man is into something different... and sometimes they don't even admit what it is.

Sigh... parenting, huh. I guess I've just entered the age where that becomes a topic of conversation... I haven't given it much thought, but my teammates surely have...
Huh, really? Well, I'll believe that when I see it.
Music? Japanese 80s city pop was pretty good. If you have a walkman, actually, I'm pretty sure I have a few tapes I could lend you if you want.
And? Did you wear that because you were really counting on not getting naked, and didn't want to show off?
You picked them out, though. Didn't you?
Oh, it's not. So I'll keep looking if you don't mind.
Well... sure, I'll go to the mall with you. I need to buy a couple things, anyway-- But we shouldn't take too long.
Huh...? Public transport is pretty efficient in some places, though. Well... if you're from this era's Japan, they may be a bit crowded, but it could be worse.
Chihiro left behind her computer, too. Do you think we could pause the game for a moment? I'd hate to lose something like that myself, so maybe I could look for her to return it...
Ehhh, I have pretty normal tastes, I guess just bondage... Crossdressing doesn't count if I don't do it for sexual purposes.
Hmmm, you don't like it? But, Hijiyama-kun, that's not what I was seeing on my screen when I was looking into your brain...
Yeah, I got it... A vendetta, though? That's an oddly specific thing to joke about.
I guess you're not wrong, Eichi, but my circumstances are still different from yours-- Really, it's fine, though. It just feels awkward when we're all together and everybody's all over their partner.
It's not like I'm trying to marry h-- To get married anytime soon. It's just that everyone I know is? It's really awkward.

Oh, that's a topic I like-- I have a hard time choosing between trends from different eras, everything has its unique charm... More often than not I just find myself in sweaters and cardigans, though.
I honestly don't know what my sign is? The matter of my birth date is... complicated. I get this feeling every November 28th, though, which might be a birthday instinct? So I might be a Sagittarius.
Hm, I guess it's unsurprising an athlete likes meat, huh... I don't care much for it in general, honestly. I kind of live off convenience store meals anyway...
I was kind of... zoning out when I bought them, so I don't actually remember. Oh, do you have any shops you'd recommend? I've been wanting to get new stuff recently.
Oh? So maybe my data was skewed, for whatever reason? Then it shouldn't be an issue to repeat the experiment, right? If what I saw wasn't accurate...
Oh, good question, Kaz... I usually just get coffee and throw myself into work until it passes. I guess cat videos are nice if I'm too tired...
It's not like I don't, but... Well, I guess you might not understand it, if you don't have the same lifespan of a human. I'm behind my peers, and I'm still being hopeless over the same guy...
Yeah, seriously... why did they all have to rush into doing that, anyway? Talking about marriage and having kids... {small}meanwhile I never even got to have a boyfriend.
Embarrassment... I suppose in certain contexts, it might feel strangely pleasurable. Getting what you might call "crossed wires" is a surprisingly common experience.
I guess there might be some kind of thrill to it... it's considered a bit taboo, isn't it? So it's natural it has this sort of underlying excitement.
...Well, there wouldn't be any "adrenalin junkies" if the thrill of a risk wasn't pleasurable. It's common sense, right?
Feeling good from embarrassment... it sounds so strange in theory, though. I guess it happens because getting past the feeling means you'll be rewarded... or something.
When you word it like that, you make it sound like something strange... it isn't, right? Especially in this context, if someone might appreciate seeing you like that...
Well, of course it's normal... if you're doing something that you perceive as risky, adrenalin gets released and you... it might feel good, sometimes.
Y-You, ah... {small}Come on, don't use someone's weak point against them like this... so unfair.
Yeah, believe me or not. If you want to tap out, I get it. And if you want proof of what I just said, regarding the "body" part... Well, you just have to get me to lose a handful of rounds, right?
Also, are you trying to impress someone here, Hijiyama-kun? You keep squishing your pecs together... oh, maybe you're trying to get me to look at you more?
So it's just you and me now, ~final~... Interesting. You're not half bad at this. May the best player win, then?
I hope you don't find that too strange, et cetera. Then again, if no one left until now I guess you're fine with this. Ah, either way, call me Okino, first name Tsukasa. Nice to meet you all.

Hmmm. I do wonder if maybe I should've taken off my skirt before the top, though. If I had thought a bit further ahead, I might've done that... there's at least one person out here who'd like to see that, right?
I hope that being able to see some of my hips isn't too much for you guys.

You know, Hijiyama-kun, there's nothing wrong with wanting some attention every now and then. You've been working so hard too...

I-- I really got into a table full of guys who tower over me, didn't I?
But tell me, do you like the outfit I picked out for to~background.time~, Hijiyama-kun? It's been a while since you got to see it, I'm sure you missed that.

Ah, I'm the shortest person in the room, huh? Not that it's an unusual thing...
(...Shouldn't a game like this be more popular between men? Or did I just get unlucky?)
Let's just get the game started, okay?
If you try on a skirt you'll get why girls like them so much. They're genuinely pretty comfortable! But there are downsides, you know, they're kind of breezy...

People still somewhat care about what's gay and what isn't in this year, right...? I just hope none of you act weirdly about this. Just look away if you're not into me, and if you are... don't give yourself a headache over it.

I wonder if people find exposing themselves or seeing others in that state more exciting on average...
Mmm. Cards are so interesting. Definitely the most interesting thing about this game, for sure.

...You don't have to stare so hard, though. It's like you think I'll run away.
So? Anyone worse off than me, or...?

Oh, yeah, I do shave down there... most guys don't, I'm guessing? It's just that, light hair on pale skin... It's barely visible but you can feel it, it weirds me out.

I kind of wonder how this would go if the people I know ended up playing this game together. I'm still placing my bets on Hijiyama-kun being the first to lose, though.
I can't put the appeal of this game into words just yet... not that it's not entertaining, but it's hard to explain.
Do I look pretty like this? I try to take decent care of myself...
I'm not really embarrassed to undress in front of others or anything, but somehow I still feel kind of a rush...

(God, but he really is... big...)

You know, I can't help but think Amiguchi would be having a blast right now, in a room full of girls... Though, I guess he's dialed back with his flirting now that he's taken, but he still does it, even if within new boundaries.
I have this teammate, Amiguchi... he used to be a huge flirt, and he still is a bit, even though he's dating Takamiya. I think they're sort of open... I'm sure he'd have a time in a place like this.
My eyes are up here, you know-- Pff, I've always wanted to say that.
I would say a picture would last longer. But you're not seeing me like this anywhere else, so just... get your staring fix now.
So? How do I look compared to the girls you've seen before? If you've seen any, that is.
I'm not some kind of weird pervert trying to fit in with the girls, just so you know. Just having a body someone wouldn't expect you have because of your presentation doesn't mean anything.

Comparing this one to all the eras I've visited, this one really is surprisingly comfortable.
Huh. I might've needed this break too. I've definitely been doing a lot of coding lately...
Ugh, all that tapping and typing makes my hands feel so... worn out..
Now that I think about it, I'm pretty sure I might've caught some students playing a game like this back in the 80s... I'm not sure if it was strip poker, but...
When you get used to the concept of time travel, it ends up really being sort of fun. Seeing how things change as time passes...
You know, I'm not going to complain about getting to meet new people. It's always interesting to see how different others can be.

Whether they... time travel or not, people still always seem to become attached to their eras, so they feel uncomfortable with both the new and the old... I guess it's all about the familiarity, maybe.
The Inventory really is a strange place... it's like its own entity, separate from time itself.
...Do they sell food here? Ah, I'm not getting any now, it's for when I'm on my way out.

If they sell yakisoba pan, I guess I'll get one before I leave...
A school, huh. Somehow, this is a bit nostalgic. Even if we didn't do anything like this then...

Doing this at a school just makes me think I should've acted out more back then... It's not like that was possible, though.
The first time I met Hijiyama-kun, we were in the old Sakura High building's hallways-- He stumbled over his words like you wouldn't believe.
Have any of you played with a Takatoshi Hijiyama, by the way? I told him coming here would be good for him to destress, but he didn't tell me if he ever actually came here or not.
Hmm, if he played this, I wonder if he'd remember the tips I taught him... Probably not.
(...Okay, but would Hijiyama-kun take off his shirt or his pants first? I can't settle on a guess for some reason.)
This would probably be embarrassing for him... But in a way, that's exactly why I thought it'd do him good. Make him get more used to these sorts of things, maybe...
Would that be cheating, though-- No, wait, we're... not together.
So, tell me, do the girl clothes actually do anything for you? I won't judge. I've met... people who liked them, before.
I can't help but wonder how Hijiyama-kun would be doing at this game, if he was here... He's a simple guy, you know. It's not easy for him to focus around people he's attracted to, so...
School uniforms in this era are pretty cute. I know some more... old fashioned guys who are opposed to the shorter skirts, but I don't think they actually mean that.
I have to say, your school uniform is pretty cute, ~schoolgirl~. I'm a little attached to the ones I already own, but I'd like to try a different one too.
So we're playing deep in the forest, away from society. Someone here is either really shy, or planning to kill us all. Well, I'll warn beforehand that I don't go own easily.
Well, the breeze here is okay, at least. I just hope I don't get bug bites or something like that.
Can we get in the springs after the game? Or are we supposed to leave right away...
Is this... some kind of foreplay for getting into the springs? I didn't know that was a thing-- God, even making a joke about it feels too goofy.
Those springs are almost tempting me into throwing the game just so I can get in.
It's not gonna be my fault if I end up seeing offices differently after this...
I'm gonna be honest... This might be my favorite place to play this game.
Well, aren't we desecrating the sacred ground of a workplace... I'm kind of into it, honestly.
The view up here is quite nice.
I'm enjoying this venue. The lighting makes for good atmosphere. It almost makes you feel like you're playing something classier than strip poker.
(This place is... romantic. It might be getting to me too, just a little bit.)
I've never traveled to Paris before. Having the opportunity to do it is nice, no matter what I had to do to get there.
I'll make a note to... come back here later, I think. It should be easy enough to figure out when there aren't games being held...
I keep getting distracted looking at the buildings and the candlelight and all... I don't think there was a sight like that in the 2100s. The buildings were just way too tall for it...
I wouldn't mind if he took me somewhere like this...
And we could look at the lights together... Hehe, I think I'm turning into a bit of a sap...
(Are there any stray cats around here...?)
I mean, I guess playing in some alleyway isn't farfetched. Whatever the hell the Inventory is, it's at least a little bit fishy.
I'm not used to all the sunlight in my eyes...
Maybe I should've sat this game out. The sunlight is making my eyes hurt.
I don't know how anyone can stand going to the beach during the day... it's much better to take a walk near one at night.
Be kind to me today, okay... I was built for blue light and cold computer labs, not this.
Is there shade anywhere around here? Because if I don't get under some, I'll be looking like a raw shrimp in about 30 minutes.
The Inventory must be doing pretty well if they can afford to hold a game at a place like this...
(...A hotel room looking like this place for me and Hijiyama-kun...)
I really do like the decoration here. It's definitely too classy for strip poker, but-- Doesn't that make it feel kind of decadent?
Well, maybe I'm just too easily impressed by anything that's sort of... vintage, but... isn't this place kind of romantic-feeling?
Well, ~perv~, aren't you dying to see what's under this skirt? I'm good at reading people, I can tell.
I can see you staring, ~perv~. If you want to see what's underneath, you know you'll have to work for it.
You know, ~perv~, you remind me of a guy I knew, Amiguchi... always chasing around anything that's vaguely girl-shaped...
So, how are you holding up, ~human~? I hope I'm not too distracting.
You know, ~human~, I noticed you made this sort of expression when I joined the table... I get the feeling you were kind of looking forward to see me like this. Am I correct?
Well, like everyone else, I don't really get to see myself through someone else's eyes often... so tell me, ~human~, do I look good right now?
So, ~other~, how are you holding up over there? Is this your first time playing? I'd guess so.
You've lost a few things, huh, ~other~... Are you paying attention to your cards? Or, well, I guess some people might come here to lose... hey, I'm just teasing.

You know, I think I still look good in girls' clothes even without the wig... but for the uniform, it's just kind of "part of the costume", you see. But my natural hair is softer, which I think is a win.
